courses.name: Optimization
courses.desc: Here you will learn the basic about optimization (of functions with multiples parameters).

courses.name: R languages
courses.desc: Quite an efficient language to do statistics or calculations.

courses.name: Statistics
courses.desc: Learn about statistics, be it descriptive or inferential statistics with examples using R language.

courses.name: Numerical analysis
courses.desc: Learn some tips about how you should handle calculations such as Ax=b on a computer.

courses.name: First-order logic
courses.desc: Learn about first-order logic, proofs, demonstration, usages with examples using OCaml language.

courses.name: Macroeconomic
courses.desc: Try to understand what's make the economy of a country (or someone operating on a wide scale).
